About Us
 


At Persistent, we believe that climate change is the most pressing challenge of our time. That is why we invest in early-stage climate focused companies that are actively developing and implementing climate change mitigation and transition with a focus on Energy Transition, Resource Transition and Agricultural Transition. We believe that these companies have the power to create a more sustainable Africa through our financial and human capital support.
For over a decade, we have invested in Clean Energy Solutions, Sustainable Transportation, Energy Efficiency and other climate focused ventures. Our investment philosophy is simple: We invest in companies that have the potential to generate strong financial returns while also making a positive impact on the African continent.
With our Venture Builder model, Persistent is more than just an investment firm. We are a community of entrepreneurs, investors and experts who are passionate about building a sustainable Africa. Headquartered in Nairobi, Persistent is a diverse team of 23 professionals from 11 countries with team members located in Lagos, Dakar, Goma, Kampala, New York, and Zurich.














                                          Meet The Persistent Team                                      

                                          The people that make it happen                                      





 











                                          Would you like to make an impact?                                      

                                          We're always on the lookout for more people                                      





 









Our Investors



Persistent is supported by highly committed investors seeking both climate and economic impact and commercial returns. Our investors include high net worth individuals, family offices, foundations, international development organizations, as well as our current and former Persistent team.
Why invest in Persistent?

Returns: Our commitment extends to delivering robust financial returns while achieving meaningful impact.
Impact: We invest in climate focused companies actively working on low-carbon solutions for a sustainable Africa.
Venture building: Led by experienced entrepreneurs and investors, our team is dedicated to building companies that possess the ability to stimulate further investments, generate significant climate and economic impact and achieve scalability.

If you are interested in knowing more about becoming an investor in Persistent, please contact us.




Get In Touch





 


                                  Kyuden Group                              

Established in 1951, Kyushu Electric Power Company and its affiliates (“Kyuden Group”) has supported the lives and business development of people in Kyushu region, acting as an integrated energy company performing fuel supply, power generation / transformation / transmission / distribution and electricity retailing. Kyuden International Corporation is the overseas business arm of Kyuden Group. Utilizing the technologies and know-how of the Kyuden Group, the company will steadily promote the development of renewable energy in Japan and overseas to contribute to the realization of carbon neutrality. The aim is to be a corporate group that can lead the change toward the decarbonization from Kyushu in Japan.







 


                                  Shell Foundation                              

Shell Foundation is an independent UK-registered charity established by the Shell Group in 2000 to create and scale new solutions to global development challenges. They apply business thinking to major social and environmental issues linked to the energy sector, and seek to leverage the skills and networks of Shell where possible to deliver greater development impact.







 


                                  FSD Africa Investments                              

FSD Africa Investments is the investment arm of FSD Africa. We provide early-stage, risk-bearing capital to inventive financial organisations that permit more capital to flow for green economic growth benefiting people and the planet. As a catalytic investor, we seek out ambitious financial ventures with the potential to test and drive innovative models and products that can address gaps in Africa’s financial market. We use a range of investment instruments designed fit for purpose to take the early-stage commercial risk, drive high market development impact, and a financial return on investment.







 


                                  Dream Project Incubators                              

Dream Project Incubators (DPI) is a development/investment firm focusing on utility-scale solar and off-grid and microgrid renewable energy projects, especially where no electricity access is available, leveraging its ability to deploy early risk capital, financing and technological expertise, relationships in the region, agility of decision making and project execution. DPI is delighted to support startups and investment firms, which are dedicated to creating better places on this planet.

About Us
 


At Persistent, we believe that climate change is the most pressing challenge of our time. That is why we invest in early-stage climate focused companies that are actively developing and implementing climate change mitigation and transition with a focus on Energy Transition, Resource Transition and Agricultural Transition. We believe that these companies have the power to create a more sustainable Africa through our financial and human capital support.
For over a decade, we have invested in Clean Energy Solutions, Sustainable Transportation, Energy Efficiency and other climate focused ventures. Our investment philosophy is simple: We invest in companies that have the potential to generate strong financial returns while also making a positive impact on the African continent.
With our Venture Builder model, Persistent is more than just an investment firm. We are a community of entrepreneurs, investors and experts who are passionate about building a sustainable Africa. Headquartered in Nairobi, Persistent is a diverse team of 23 professionals from 11 countries with team members located in Lagos, Dakar, Goma, Kampala, New York, and Zurich.














                                          Meet The Persistent Team                                      

                                          The people that make it happen                                      





 











                                          Would you like to make an impact?                                      

                                          We're always on the lookout for more people                                      





 









Our Investors



Persistent is supported by highly committed investors seeking both climate and economic impact and commercial returns. Our investors include high net worth individuals, family offices, foundations, international development organizations, as well as our current and former Persistent team.
Why invest in Persistent?

Returns: Our commitment extends to delivering robust financial returns while achieving meaningful impact.
Impact: We invest in climate focused companies actively working on low-carbon solutions for a sustainable Africa.
Venture building: Led by experienced entrepreneurs and investors, our team is dedicated to building companies that possess the ability to stimulate further investments, generate significant climate and economic impact and achieve scalability.

If you are interested in knowing more about becoming an investor in Persistent, please contact us.




Get In Touch





 


                                  Kyuden Group                              

Established in 1951, Kyushu Electric Power Company and its affiliates (“Kyuden Group”) has supported the lives and business development of people in Kyushu region, acting as an integrated energy company performing fuel supply, power generation / transformation / transmission / distribution and electricity retailing. Kyuden International Corporation is the overseas business arm of Kyuden Group. Utilizing the technologies and know-how of the Kyuden Group, the company will steadily promote the development of renewable energy in Japan and overseas to contribute to the realization of carbon neutrality. The aim is to be a corporate group that can lead the change toward the decarbonization from Kyushu in Japan.







 


                                  Shell Foundation                              

Shell Foundation is an independent UK-registered charity established by the Shell Group in 2000 to create and scale new solutions to global development challenges. They apply business thinking to major social and environmental issues linked to the energy sector, and seek to leverage the skills and networks of Shell where possible to deliver greater development impact.







 


                                  FSD Africa Investments                              

FSD Africa Investments is the investment arm of FSD Africa. We provide early-stage, risk-bearing capital to inventive financial organisations that permit more capital to flow for green economic growth benefiting people and the planet. As a catalytic investor, we seek out ambitious financial ventures with the potential to test and drive innovative models and products that can address gaps in Africa’s financial market. We use a range of investment instruments designed fit for purpose to take the early-stage commercial risk, drive high market development impact, and a financial return on investment.







 


                                  Dream Project Incubators                              

Dream Project Incubators (DPI) is a development/investment firm focusing on utility-scale solar and off-grid and microgrid renewable energy projects, especially where no electricity access is available, leveraging its ability to deploy early risk capital, financing and technological expertise, relationships in the region, agility of decision making and project execution. DPI is delighted to support startups and investment firms, which are dedicated to creating better places on this planet.
